description: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.
The request requires user authentication.
The request cannot be processed without a valid payment.
The request was forbidden.
The requested resource could not be found.
The request method is known by the server but has been disabled and cannot be used.
The request could not be processed because of a conflict in the request.
The server refuses to accept the request without a defined Content-Length.
The server does not meet one of the preconditions that the requester put on the request.
The server is refusing to process a request because the request payload is larger than the server is willing or able to process.
The server is refusing to service the request because the entity of the request is in a format not supported by the requested resource for the requested method.
The server is refusing to process the request because the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time.
The server encountered something unexpected that didn't allow it to complete the request.
The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
The server received an invalid response from an upstream server, or the request could not be processed due to a bad gateway.
The server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
The server did not receive a timely response from an upstream server.
Only platform administrators can perform this action.
The requested resource is available on the platform but inaccessible without manual request through email with reference.
The requested resource has been removed from the platform due to copyright takedown request.
The requested resource has been banned from the platform.
The user already exists.
chatId doesn't match any existing chat id or any existing user id
The token provided is valid. However, it is revoked and cannot be used to authenticate.
